name: Lilith Swap
description: Lilith Swap is the baseline ecosystem for a bridge between L1 Ethereum Mainnet NFT utility, and L2 Polygon Blockchain Gaming. Lilith Swap's main token LLTH is the primary means of exchange within this ecosystem. Lilith Swap will host P2E Parlor games, ERC20 Staking pools, defi ecommerce for physical merchandise, and most importantly, NFT Staking pools and Blockchain Gaming framework that will be available as a product/service for other P2E projects.
